ruling: - Putting 2 counters on [[B.E.S. Covered Core]] is a Trigger Effect that activates when it is Normal Summoned.

- If [[B.E.S. Covered Core]] battles a monster, and afterwards you lose the coin toss, so that [[B.E.S. Covered Core]] now has no counters, it is not destroyed because it still had a counter during damage calculation.
